rows.name: view_and_finder_intro
rows.value:
**Topics Display** We divided early mathematics into topics. These topics are ideas from all math standards and do not represent any one of them. The topics are displayed in a hierarchy of three levels: top-level major categories, middle-level categories, and finally at the lowest level are the topics.

**Select a Standard** View the topics by selecting a standard for the top-level and middle-level categories. The default standard is EFM, but you can choose any other standard that we support. If you select a standard other than EFM, each Resource will show the individual standards related to it.

rows.name: learning_pathways_intro
rows.value: **Pathways** Another way to view the topics is as part of learning pathways. These paths show how the topics fit together and depend on each other.
